data.name: HomeTab
data.value: Home
data.comment: The name of the home tab in the primary Blish HUD tabbed window shown when the mouse hovers over the tab.

data.name: AboutSection
data.value: About
data.comment: The name of the about menu item and section that is shown in the settings.

data.name: OverlaySettingsSection
data.value: Overlay Settings
data.comment: The name of the overlay settings menu item and section that is shown in the settings.

data.name: AboutLoveMessage
data.value: Designed and built with all the love in Tyria by the Blish HUD team with help from many more!

data.name: Setting_ShowInTaskbar_Description
data.value: When enabled, Blish HUD will be shown in the taskbar while running.

data.name: Setting_ShowInTaskbar_DisplayName
data.value: Show in Taskbar

data.name: Setting_StayInTray_DisplayName
data.value: Minimize to tray when Guild Wars 2 Closes.

data.name: Setting_AppCulture_Description
data.value: Determines the language used when displaying Blish HUD text and when requests are made to the GW2 web API.

data.name: Setting_AppCulture_DisplayName
data.value: Application & API Language

data.name: Setting_StayInTray_Description
data.value: If true, Blish HUD will automatically minimize when GW2 closes and will continue running until GW2 is launched again. You can also use the Blish HUD icon in the tray to launch Guild Wars 2.

data.name: AboutAnetNotice
data.value: ©2010-{0} ArenaNet, LLC. All rights reserved. Guild Wars, Guild Wars 2, Heart of Thorns, Guild Wars 2: Path of Fire, ArenaNet, NCSOFT, the Interlocking NC Logo, and all associated logos and designs are trademarks or registered trademarks of NCSOFT Corporation. All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

data.name: Setting_UseGameVolume_Description
data.value: When enabled, Blish HUD will adjust it's volume to the game audio.

data.name: Setting_UseGameVolume_DisplayName
data.value: Use Game Volume

data.name: Setting_Volume_DisplayName
data.value: Volume

data.name: Setting_Volume_Description
data.value: Determines the volume of Blish HUD. Only has an effect when 'Use Game Volume' is deactivated.

data.name: Setting_AudioDevice_DisplayName
data.value: Audio Output Device

data.name: Setting_AudioDevice_Description
data.value: This determines the Audio output device used by Blish HUD. The Gw2OutputDevice adjusts itself to whatever GW2 is using.

data.name: ConnectionStatus_Mumble_Name
data.value: MumbleLink

data.name: ConnectionStatus_Mumble_Disconnected
data.value:
Unable to connect to MumbleLink with name '{0}'.
Check what launch arguments were used to launch both Guild Wars 2 and Blish HUD.

data.name: ConnectionStatus_Mumble_Connected
data.value: Connected to MumbleLink with name '{0}'.

data.name: ConnectionStatus_ArcDPSBridge_Name
data.value: ArcDPS Bridge

data.name: ConnectionStatus_ArcDPSBridge_Connected
data.value: Connected to ArcDPS via bridge plugin.

data.name: ConnectionStatus_ArcDPSBridge_Disconnected
data.value:
No connection received from bridge.
It might not be installed.
